law.text: The liens existing pursuant to KRS 131.515 and 134.420 shall take precedence over any claim of right of an insured owner, mortgagee, assignee, or other interested party, except as otherwise provided by the laws of the United States.
law.history: Amended 2009 Ky. Acts ch. 10, sec. 68, effective January 1, 2010. -- Created 1980 Ky. Acts ch. 278, sec. 3, effective July 15, 1980.
